author: Roy Schestowitz
title: Using Microsoft Chatbot to Generate Microsoft FUD Against SSH/OpenSSH
text:
Using Microsoft Chatbot to Generate Microsoft FUD Against SSH/OpenSSH
It's from the
 "prime suspect" of the Day:
And of course gptzero.me deems this to be LLM slop, not a real article!
Chatbots controlled by Microsoft and
curated by wage slaves in Kenya have become weapon against "Linux" because some unprincipled fools and liars misuse chatbots to craft fake articles (easier than done manually). Now they do the same to SSH/OpenSSH, which competes against proprietary bloatware of Microsoft and its partners. We've seen and rebutted such nonsense before, even as recently as 3 weeks ago.
We need to call out the people who spew out Microsoft propaganda (often generated by Microsoft entities) into the Web. Later on the scrapers will pick up those lies, reinforcing their own biases, which were tweaked by Microsoft staff.
